title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. II, art. 2, pt. 30 - Drawing Of Earned Credits Upon Separation Or Entry Into Armed Forces
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. II, art. 2, pt. 30 - Drawing Of Earned Credits Upon Separation Or Entry Into Armed Forces

State Regulations
§ 30.1 - Payment for accruals upon separation
§ 30.2 - Payment for accruals upon entry into armed forces
§ 30.3 - Payment for overtime accruals upon appointment, promotion or transfer
§ 30.4 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. II, art. 2, pt. 30

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, §6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
